item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Sunday, March 2, 2025 at 4:20 AM UTC
item.description:
1. The early days of Linux (2023) (105 points | 19 comments)
2. The most unhinged video wall, made out of Chromebooks (360 points | 36 comments)
3. How Flash games shaped the video game industry (2020) (81 points | 36 comments)
4. Show HN: Berlin Swapfest – Electronics flea market (131 points | 22 comments)
5. Firefly Blue Ghost Mission 1 Lunar Landing (45 points | 12 comments)
6. Show HN: I made a website where you can create your own "Life in Weeks" timeline (118 points | 31 comments)
7. Nuclear Reactor Lasers: From fission to photon (37 points | 3 comments)
8. Euclid finds complete Einstein Ring in NGC galaxy (49 points | 3 comments)
9. The NIH Is Being Slashed and Burned, Not "Reformed" (6 points | discuss)
10. Reimagining Fluid Typography (13 points | 1 comment)
11. Rifling through the archives with Robert Caro (15 points | discuss)
12. Efabless – Shutdown Notice (93 points | 42 comments)
13. Python as a second language empathy (2018) (34 points | 15 comments)
14. Abusing C to implement JSON parsing with struct methods (59 points | 7 comments)
15. Making o1, o3, and Sonnet 3.7 hallucinate for everyone (194 points | 151 comments)
16. China tells its AI leaders to avoid U.S. travel over security concerns (324 points | 260 comments)
17. Maestro – Next generation mobile UI automation (140 points | 53 comments)
18. Show HN: I took over Painteresque, a 14 year old Objective-C app and rebuilt it (48 points | 14 comments)
19. Wealthy Americans fuel half of us economy consumer spending (36 points | 28 comments)
20. Drone captures narwhals using their tusks to explore, forage and play (53 points | 12 comments)
21. What do people see when they're tripping? Analyzing Erowid's trip reports (145 points | 184 comments)
22. Backyard bird has a lot to teach us about sex variability (20 points | 1 comment)
23. GLP-1 drugs: An economic disruptor? (2024) (316 points | 409 comments)
24. Video encoding requires using your eyes (72 points | 32 comments)
25. Why it's so hard to build a jet engine (354 points | 173 comments)
26. Certificate Transparency in Firefox (162 points | 96 comments)
27. Why can't we screenshot frames from DRM-protected video on Apple devices? (108 points | 116 comments)
28. Unleashed Recompiled – Unofficial PC Port of Sonic Unleashed (23 points | 2 comments)
29. Emacs Tree-sitter custom highlighting (76 points | 9 comments)
30. Xcode constantly phones home (154 points | 51 comments)
